name: MANTICORE

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The manticore makes three attacks, using Rend or Tail Spike in any combination.

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spike
actions.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 100/200 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

raw_text:

HP 68 (8d10 + 24)

MOD 	SAVE

MOD 	SAVE

Senses Darkvision 60 ft.; Passive Perception 11
Languages Common
CR 3 (XP 700; PB +2)
Actions
Multiattack. The manticore makes three attacks, using Rend or Tail Spike in
any combination.
Rend. Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft.
Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.
Tail Spike. Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 100/200 ft.
Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3)

Large Monstrosity, Lawful Evil
